I emailed the address, then the automatic system asked for the billing address again and so on. I emailed three times, they ignored my emails and kept asking for the billing address.

Review.Titre: The subscribe button kept popping up
Review.Contenu: The subscribe button kept popping up.  Took me a longer time to place an order than I expected.

Review.Titre: Bad shipping estimate
Review.Contenu: The online order in certain amount of time to ship is a lie. I ordered within the 12 hours it said and my order didn't ship until the next day. It's just a way for mouser to secure in order.

Review.Titre: Worst treatment of my life!
Review.Contenu: I purchased some automotive switches from them and needed to return them as my customer changed their requirement. The agreed to the return, but when they received them they claimed that the switches did not come from them and I had a choice to either have them returned or they would discard them.I tried communicating this and was given the contact information of Carlo Gutierrez. He doesn't return calls and they just blow you off essentially calling me a liar and a cheat. They are a terrible company to do business with!

Review.Titre: An absolute nightmare to deal with
Review.Contenu: Easily the worst electronics company I have ever done business with. Ordered parts for a small prototype run (~$500usd) due to Mouser having stock that my normal suppliers didn't. Proceeded to spend two weeks of back and forth over the phone having order after order cancelled (with no follow up at all) due to completely opaque reason. Eventually settled on wire transfer to "verify" the company. Spend 3 days waiting for information on customs. Eventually had to change the shipping address and then had them ship the order without indicating I would need to provide self-brokerage (adding additional cost you typically never need with electronics firms). No remorse whatsoever from anyone I spoke with. Could not imagine placing a larger order with them.

Review.Titre: Absolutely terrible
Review.Contenu: Absolutely terrible. Without any due diligence they will label you as a distributor and cancel your supply line orders for products you build. They then make you wait weeks to prove yourself that you are the end consumer and involved in manufacturing and not reselling. I will never do business with them again and I really recommend no one else building a small business do so either. They could at least ask what you're doing.....before cutting off critical supplies as your tiny business grows. Basically they are just forcing you to just get them cheaper from overseas and sending money outside the American economy.

Review.Titre: Horrible return policy
Review.Contenu: Horrible return policy. If the product and the packaging is not in pristine condition they will NOT take it back. Steer clear from them if you’re not sure your keeping your purchase!

Review.Titre: Beware: Broken payments and awful customer support
Review.Contenu: My hope is that this review serves as a warning for any potential customers thinking of ordering from Mouser. If you have any type of issue whatsoever with your order you will instantly regret it as soon as you have to interact with their customer service.The saga unfolded as follows:1. Following an order on their website, I received an immediate request to complete the End-User Certification form.2. Despite promptly submitting the form, there was an inexplicable month-long silence, prompting my inquiry into the status of my order.3. A delayed response indicated the need for more specific information on my form, leading to a revised submission, eventual order release, and a tracking number.4. Mouser then fails to charge my credit card, which results in a post-shipment refund.5. I then get an email from Accounts Representative (AA#1). The correspondence with AA#1 included baseless accusations of a "chargeback," requiring a protracted seven-email exchange for an acknowledgment that the error was made by them.6. I informed AA#1 that I had already entered my credit card details into my Mouser Account, but apparently they are not able to charge those cards? AA#1 instead directed me to a separate, seemingly unaffiliated and non-functional website for credit card details submission, and then stopped responding when I informed them that the site does not work.7. After a few days I get a new email from completely different Accounts Representative (AA#2) that displayed a concerning lack of awareness having no knowledge of my correspondence with AA#1 which necessitated the manual transmission of the entire email thread to avoid having to start the whole thing over again.8. AA#2 then sends me a receipt for my order and ask me to send them a wire transfer, and then completely ignores me when I tell them that the receipt does not actually contain any payment information or instructions whatsoever.9. I finally manage to perform a wire-transfer, which my bank charged 6% of the total price for, erasing any price advantage Mouser might have had. Not to mention the stress and time lost of having to deal with their abysmal custom support.But honestly, the worst part has to be the almost complete lack of remorse or good will for the avoidable challenges stemming completely from Mouser's unwarranted refund initiation. Especially from AA#2.

Review.Titre: My order was cancelled, I was not told
Review.Contenu: my order was cancelled and I was never contacted. They said they couldn't look up my order on information without an account number but nowhere on my account can i an account number (only my login info).. online help was terrible. Rez was the only bright spot. He was very helpful.

Review.Titre: Not a trustworthy company
Review.Contenu: Not a trustworthy company, try to avoid. Great stock of components, and useful for hobbyists, but you can never trust them when items are backordered. We have, for several times now, experienced that parts that we ordered, and confirmed to be in stock by mouser, was sold to other customers, and then "our" "in stock" status was changed to backordered with very long lead times. Very unprofessional.

Review.Titre: Access Denied on their website frequently...
Review.Contenu: I'm on Cable Internet without a public IP... Its more common now that IPv4 is exhausted. They block my connection from just shopping on their website with Access Denied. I have to use a VPN and clear my cookies. Bad for business since their product categorization is better than DigiKeys for many of the parts I look for.

Review.Titre: Payment runarounds. Terrible experience.
Review.Contenu: Super difficult company to give money to. Tried to place an order with a credit card and they left it sitting “under review” for 5 days until I called and asked what was happening. They just say they “can’t verify the buyer lives at the address stated” not sure how that justifies anything or remotely makes sense to not process the payment. I see the pending charge clearly on my credit card yet they won’t send it through or prepare my order. They’re requesting me to send a wire transfer instead because that somehow is magically better and able to verify I live at the address? Terrible experience.

Review.Titre: Friday PM order placed for Saturday…
Review.Contenu: Friday PM order placed for Saturday delivery. Went to my account to track the order at 8pm only to find that the order was flagged for export control. I called support only to be told that the export department was closed and would return Monday, at best the order would ship on Monday and arrive TUESDAY!I had the agent cancel the order and I was able to place the order again with enough time for it to still ship the same day - only this time I had missed the Saturday delivery cutoff, leaving Monday as my only option. Fingers crossed it ships this time!

Review.Titre: Parts ordered on 4/1/23 shipped 4/3/23…
Review.Contenu: Parts ordered on 4/1/23 shipped 4/3/23 with estimated delivery on 4/12/23. Parts were in stock when ordered. It's 4/24/23 parts are still not here. Called today and was told that because I used economy shipping it can take 3-4 months to receive the parts. I have used economy shipping from other electronic supply company's and it has never taken more than a week. It was never stated that it would take months if I used economy shipping. I ended up ordering parts from another supplier using economy shipping and it was here in 5 days. Was told the tracking number provided was just a number and not a real tracking number, eventhough it states label created package not received by carrier. Not that they care, but they lost a customer over $20 in parts.

Review.Titre: HP Digital probe P6136 sold without license.
Review.Contenu: You sold a P6136 digital probe set for my MSO22 scope, which I could not use and could not return, due to a missing license. There was no data when I made this purchase that a license was necessary. Your customer support person, I think George was his name, told me to open the bags, as the license should have been included. A rip-off of over a thousand dollars. I've spent many times this amount over the years. I do not think I will ever get over this purchase.Thanks for your response, but no joy. I was forced to spend another $1,000 with Tektronix to acquire the license, which comes with a digital probe. Now I’ve got two probes, one of which I’m not permitted to return to Mouser because the bag has been opened (your customer support person suggested I open it to find the missing license).You sell the probe without a license, when it doesn’t work (because you did let the buyer know a license was required) you’ve just cost your client over $1,000 for something you Know he won’t be able to use. Very misleading business practice.

Review.Titre: My experience used to be great
Review.Contenu: My experience used to be great. They had a very fast order processing and shipping no matter what, local or export. You used to get a one person customer service who made responsible for any issues related to your purchase. Now your order can fall in the “export review” process for weeks without getting any updates or estimated shipping date. In case you get an answer or customer service emails they´re signed by “Customer Service Representative”, so you cannot make sure someone is making responsible for the follow up. They keep asking for the same information you already provided. If your order is international, the US representatives ignore it and, if you persist, they refer your case (without giving an answer to you) to your country´s representative, who has no idea about your actual situation and assume your order is going to be exported even if it is not. It is really frustrating. I understand they have their own policies and must have a lot of work due to COVID and chip shortages, but they waste more time by being inefficient in their customer service.

Review.Titre: No service on urgent spare parts, no information about horrible delays
Review.Contenu: Es werden dringend Ersatzteile von Infineon benötigt, die in ausreichender Stückzahl auf Lager sind (Wert ca. 500,00€). Bei Mouser geht niemand ans Telefon, den ganzen Tag am 08.04.2022 nicht, es ruft auch niemand zurück. Also bleibt nur online-Bestellung. Ware bezahlt und für Dienstag, 12.04.2022 bestätigt bekommen.Die Ware ist bis Samstag, 16.04.2022 nicht geliefert, Mouser wollte eine aktuelle Bestätigung nun versenden, auch dieses war eine leere Zusage. Man hätte in der Woche vor dem Bestelltag Streiks gehabt, also hätte ich die Ware auch über den Wettbewerb i England beziehen können, was normal 2 Tage länger dauert, also jetzt längst erledigt wäre.Am Telefon dieses Mal jemand erreicht, aber eine sehr unwillige Dame ohne Verständnis für die ärgerliche Situation.Mouser sitzt Probleme auf Kosten der Kunden aus, informiert nicht, ist nicht erreichbar, ruft nicht zurück, sendet trotz Zusage keine Infos - man steht im Regen.Sendung könnte nun am Dienstag, also eine Woche später eintreffen als zugesagt, oder auch wieder nicht. Fazit: wer Ware wirklich benötigt, darf hier nichts ordern. Vorkasse ist geleistet, Lieferung oder gar Auskunft darüber = Fehlanzeige, auch auf Verlangen keinerlei Unterstützung. Nie wieder Mouser Deutschland.Urgent spare parts needed, moduls from Infineon, on stock at Mouser (system information).Friday morning 8th April no one at telephone, no reaction to urgent recall at answering machine. So online order placed and payed in advance (500,00€). Delivery time given by the system is Tuesday 12th April = o.k.Nothing arrived up today (Saturday 16th April), delayed delivery might arrive on Tuesday 19th April or later.Asked for further information on phone on 14th April (day before holiday) (very long time to wait for service, 1x hanged up by the mouser system). Unpolite and not really interested female assistant on phone, given information: some days before I placed the order has been a strike in another European country, that might cause delays, but no info given to the system. So I did not order the goods at a competitor, who has had the units on its British stock, because of 2 days longer delivery time, but meanwhile it would have been far in advance! The promises email about an update about estimated delivery time or situation has never been sent to me. Conclusion: if you really need some parts, do not order them at Mouser. No replies on phone calls, no or bad service, no responsibilities. Cocksure of oneself staff instead.So never again Mouser Germany (Munich)

Review.Contenu: DODGY! Tried to get personal details to verify an address which is very clearly stated on my order. Took 2 payments which neither were the figures I had ordered, they kept saying they hadn't when they had. Had to report as fraudulent to my bank. Keep away from!

Review.Titre: possible scam
Review.Contenu: not sent order and last 2 weeks not react to emails. How can  I refund my money? site even have no cancel order buttons----Definitely scam. Another month pass and nothing heppens. Only ask to wait more . No money, no No proof of thay do anything. I have to ask bank, maybe it can return money and block this scammers

Review.Titre: Mouser Electronics needs more time…
Review.Contenu: Mouser Electronics needs more information from the supplier to be able to export the order after i've sendt all the documents they required, paid for the items and made sure that every single item was on stock. Cancelled my order after 4 days. A waste of time!

Review.Titre: Nordic: Worst Customer Support ever experienced
Review.Contenu: Received a wrong part. Complained immediately by e-mail and wrote I urgently needed a replacement. Gave all relevant info in first e-mail. The reason was clear from the start: A mismatch between part description and internal part no. in Mouser database. Anybody could verify this by looking up the part on the website. Now Customer Support dragged me through 6 email rounds each time asking new irrelevant questions and photo documentation. I answered right away. Next email from Mouser came at best next day. I complained first time October, 22 and still not got the right part November, 11. Incredible.

Review.Titre: Your site is poor
Review.Contenu: Your site is poor. The part Kycon STPX3501C should come with the hardware to be able to mount it without having to struggle to get the information and use the part. Mouser is currently set up for the customer to miserably fail all the time. We are going to shift business away from Mouser because of this.

Review.Titre: Can't find stuff without assistance
Review.Contenu: Can't find stuff without assistance. Can't fix email in my account and now there is a problem with my company name, was fine before.This site sucks. I used this site with no problems in the past.Wasted about a hour! Not happy. I will find a different vendor.

Review.Titre: Component Filtering Choices for items
Review.Contenu: I can never get the "filters" to apply so I can narrow down the available choices. I have never liked the filtering the way it is set up now. You have to hunt, pick, try, change to get to a component you would like. I make my choices but the "APPLY FILTERS" never highlights. MOUSER is trying to tree down to far with to many choices per component! I have been buying parts from Mouser for years... I like things before the "extensive" filtering... it could be made simpler again.

Review.Titre: Deceiving experience
Review.Contenu: Deceiving experience-I ordered only products available in stock, however only half of my order was delivered, the other half was back ordered and available 1 or 2 months after.I asked for a refund instead of waiting for the backorder, the refund takes 2 to 3 weeks.-I wanted to pay with normal online checkout. However they did not accept the online payment and asked to create a customer account and required a bank transfer. The payment process validation took 3 days before the order got fulfilled. Thus more delays for the order.

Review.Titre: Dreadful service so far
Review.Contenu: Ordered a sensor, plenty in stock, company takes pride in its "same day dispatch policy" where it's plastered everywhere, yet 48 hours later still no signs of it being sent out.Edit: Turns out that the site makes 0 mention to shipping strictly from the US, and you'd might think that with several branches in the EU there'd be a warehouse in the EU.Proceeded to cancel order with assistant via live chat and no refund so far.Edit 2:Despite the service provider's casual response below would just like to point out that the refund was not processed so far, nor have they responded to my email in this regard.

Review.Titre: Think many times before you order from mouser
Review.Contenu: Think many times before you order something from mouser. They send me defective + incomplete products and do not accept returns. For 30 days they claim to need time to investigate the case, but eventually the mouser stops responding to my emails.

Review.Titre: Horrible company
Review.Contenu: Horrible company! Stole our money the day before Christmas! Wouldn’t even tell us what was ordered by our credit card UNAUTHORIZED. Said the would need a subpoena. So essentially protected the thieves over us, which is essentially aiding and abetting!

Review.Titre: Charging shipping for backordered…
Review.Contenu: Charging shipping for backordered items?! Reply 6/18/21:But you don't offer any discount on the initial shipment to offset cost of backorder shipment. Not right to charge customer extra for your lack of product.

Review.Titre: I had to build my freaking cart 3 times
Review.Contenu: I had to build my freaking cart THREE or FOUR times and even then I had to submit order a dozen times.   And there were even more problems after all THAT.    Usually, you guys are great, but this experience sucked.

Review.Titre: Do not buy from mouser!
Review.Contenu: Do not buy from mouser! Their customer service is unacceptable! They would not refund a purchase that had shipping issues.EDIT: After seeing mouser's comment I reached out to them but got no response. I still recommend any prospective customers to stay away.

Review.Titre: Very inconvenient order status
Review.Contenu: I just submitted an order and the Print PDF option didn't include shipping. Why the hell wouldn't I want to see the shipping charge in my total bill? I'm trying to keep track of receipts for a business and shipping is part of my cost. Ridiculous. Back to Digikey.

Review.Titre: Poor service after receiving incorrect item
Review.Contenu: Ordered a bunch of products. One product in the shipment was wrong. Been trying to get a resolution via e-mail and phone for the past three weeks to get a resolution (preferably shipment of the product I have actually paid for). According to the web store there is stock for the product in question and about 50 alternatives for it in stock. Was first offered a refund due to insufficient stock of alternative items (even though there seemed to be stock for the originally ordered item too). After asking why can't Mouser just ship the original item, I have been just told repeatedly that "We will get back to this soon..." and no contact from Mouser after that. The reason why I chose Mouser over Aliexpress etc. was that I needed the correct parts fast. Won't make that mistake again.

Review.Titre: Whole process was delayed by 3 days. Refuse to do anything
Review.Contenu: Whole process was delayed by 3 days because they forgot to confirm my order. A time sensitive package which is the whole reason I paid for better shipping, and they didn't give me anything to compensate for it. n

Review.Titre: Cancelling orders for parts they have in stock without any explanation
Review.Contenu: Dreadful company to do business with. I placed another order and paid by Visa Debit only for them to cancel it a few hours later with no explaination. Go to Digikey the process is much easier and they never cancel orders for parts they have in stock.

Review.Titre: This "CAPTCHA" & JAVA crap is extremely …
Review.Contenu: This "CAPTCHA" & JAVA crap is extremely annoying coming up all the time. Makes me lose what I am thinking about and some times won't even let me add things to my project. Called customer service this morning and talked with "Misty". She insisted that it has to be there to protect me and the web site. It only protects me from purchasing things from you. She suggested that I buy from some other source. Sorry, but I have to agree. After a lot of years with Mouser, this may very well be my last order if you continue to make it so difficult to order, and you don't care if I do.

Review.Titre: They never ship as promised.
Review.Contenu: They never ships out in time, even when ordering well before cut-off times. Especially when ordering on fridays. This is for both CC orders and NET orders. Never have problems with DIgiKey, Avnet or Arrow. We will not use Mouser anymore.

Review.Titre: Very terrible customer support
Review.Contenu: Very terrible customer support. I bought a beagle board blue from them. It arrived with a connector that was broken off and another connector that was barely hanging on. I am using the board for a robotics project and its completely useless as it is. I emailed mouser thinking i was going to get a replacement sent out right away. Instead, they chose to interrogate me, ask me questions that take them a day or more to reply to, and then proceed to ask for pictures. Its been 5 days and I have still not received any instructions on how to get a replacement from them. I will personally never use this company again.

Review.Titre: Very poor customer service
Review.Contenu: Very poor customer service, order arrived 6 months late and was still sent with the more expensive delivery service (next day) with no option to change it even though the order came 6 months late!!! Absolutely will not use Mouser UK again.

Review.Titre: I tried to order items for a project …
Review.Contenu: I tried to order items for a project that is ongoing.First I get some email that is basically exactly formulated as a Phishing Scam. I reply to it since it is important that I get my parts to the developer since there is a deadline, but exactly as a Phishing Scam I get no reply.Some days go and I start to wonder where the parts are so I send another email and yet again no answer.Some time goes again and I get worried why there is such a big delay, I check my account and I can not find the transaction so I send another Email. Yet again, no reply.This is the first time I buy from "Mouser" and probably the last.

Review.Titre: Ordering errors nightmare
Review.Contenu: The Mouser ordering app is broken.  When any error is detected in the order submission, the app directs the customer to correct the error.  However, the app gives the customer NO INDICATION of where the error occurs.  Flippin' moronic code!

Review.Titre: Very poor customer service - returns
Review.Contenu: Needed a soldering station and Mouser had the right kind of product, but only upon receipt did. I notice they were marketing North American rated product (120V/60Hz) product in Germany (220V/50Hz). No reply to electronic returns request. Calls to local customer service dropped upon transfer to person without any interaction. Chat function gets India in out of local office hours, very friendly, but can’t help in this case. In office hours could get transferred to local chat team, but unfriendly and unable to help. Escalate feature on website resulted in a bounced mail, e-mail address at Mouser no longer valid! Guess I have to drive to Munich, lucky for me just 50km away. Seems I have a destination to aim for as soon as I clear isolation

Review.Titre: Incredibly hard to use checkout…
Review.Contenu: Incredibly hard to use checkout process. This is something from 2001. No easy create an account, add another credit card, more.  One of the worst checkout processes. I'll go back to DigiKey, TD, L-Com more.

Review.Titre: Received broken components
Review.Contenu: Received broken components, Mouser customer service was genuinely awful.

Review.Titre: Incompetent
Review.Contenu: My experience with Mouser has honestly been one of my worst ever experiences. Placed an order, 2 days later (after promising to ship the order immediately), they ship it.They screw up the shipping information so Fedex reject the order and send it back to them.They do nothing.I chase, they say I have to wait for them to handle the 'return' before they can reship it.They eventually reorder it for me 9 days later and the order STILL HASN'T SHIPPED.What is wrong with these people? They are utterly incompetent at fixing a mistake.To make matters worse, their customer service teams just tell lies and the complaint escalation form on their website doesn't get answered after 72 hours.ORDER NO. 252946633

Review.Titre: After 5+ years of excellent service....
Review.Contenu: After 5+ years of excellent service, I’ve recently run into several issues during the last few weeks (prompting me to search online to see my issues are isolated).  After reading these multiple reviews, clearly there is a systemic problem that we’re not being informed of.Why suddenly, in the last few week, is COVID being a scapegoat (that hasn’t existed for the last year)?Delayed in orders, then received an incorrect part.  Delayed customer-service contact with no follow-up on how to return the incorrect shipment.  Had to go ahead and re-order (on my own $) with a product that was in-stock, only to find out that it isn’t actually in-stock and now delayed for months.  I certainly wouldn’t have ordered/paid for a product (TWICE), that isn’t available.

Review.Titre: 2 Weeks, Still No Delivery!
Review.Contenu: I get it, Covid, Brexit etc... these are problems, but they seems to being used as excuses to not put things right.Why am I sat here 2 weeks after ordering still waiting for a delivery, when just about all their competitors have managed to avoid these problems and deliver in a reasonable time frame?Firstly it took over a week to pack and ship my order. Up front their said a possible 2 day delay. Unacceptable.Then FedEx got their hands on it, ohhhhh my word they are terrible at the moment. I've had shipments from UPS and even USPS within these timescales deliver pretty much on time. It's been sat in their UK warehouse for 2 days now without moving. Frustrating is not the word! Come on Mouser, you were once incredible, what has happened to you?

Review.Titre: this company will take money from you…
Review.Contenu: this company will take money from you debit card and cancelled your order. costumer support sagar will ask you credit card details. then cancelled. dot buy from this company.

Review.Titre: After they charged my card they wanted…
Review.Contenu: After they charged my card they wanted me to verify my address/billing by sending in a driver's license and bank statement? My address is good and the same for both. Never had this happen anywhere I've shopped online and not willing to jump through hoops to get the order delivered. Cancelled, awaiting a charge back on my CC now.I'm not buying your canned response. My CC even said they never heard of that before. You had all the information you needed to verify it was my card and I was who I said. And if you were so concerned about the safety of your online customers then why did you charge the card BEFORE you requested additional information? If the info you had raised some sort of red flag for you why would you not address that first? First time buyers beware.

Review.Titre: Website running extremely slow…
Review.Contenu: The website has been running extremely slow for a lot of months now. We are losing production time waiting to navigate from one page to another. Please fix this problem.

Review.Titre: Difficult to navigate parts catalog - refused return
Review.Contenu: Bought a pair of Google Neural Processing units. There is one versions using PCIe interface and two other wih oddball M.2 interfaces. Its unclear which one they will deliver seems hat they were out of stock on the PCI versions so they just shipped me 2 impossible to use M2 devices. They asked for a picture of what was delivered and said sorry you cant return it because its open. Nice huh? not sure how I was supposed to make that work. Just remember there are options like seedstudio, Microcenter etc that carry a lot of these things. Sorry that Mouser doesn't seem to care about the customer experience.

Review.Titre: My order was cancelled without any notification
Review.Contenu: My order was cancelled without any notification. I am so irritated - could you not send an email to notify a customer that there was an issue with their order? And I called customer support today, and they had no idea why it was cancelled, instead wasting my time speculating about whether the cc address was wrong (it was not). Then, the second person I spoke to on the call just dropped the connection. When I called back, the first person who answered seemed to recognize that I was very frustrated, and connected me to a much more helpful person who (it appears) is going to fix things up. But really, why don't you email the customer when you cancel their order. It's a really bad customer experience. However, I upgraded this review from 1 star to 2 because the last person I spoke to was friendly and helpful.

Review.Titre: Check out your website
Review.Contenu: Check out your website! I'd select an item then buy X amount and it would come up and say X ordered item for $ amount and under that proceed to checkout or continue shopping. When I select continue shopping it did nothing! I would have to go to your search at the top of your page and the item I wanted from there to continue shopping.

Review.Titre: I don't like the layout of the online…
Review.Contenu: I don't like the layout of the online ordering process.It should be streamlined.The purchase order number and the ship via need to go in the front/first portion of the form.  Ship via s with our account number for FEDEX or UPS should come up automatically.  We shouldn't have to every time check off N30, ETC.  Or did I miss something when i signed up?Let me know.  Thanks,Terri Oberinger

Review.Titre: Lack of responses to emails is irritating
Review.Contenu: Mouser will deliver what you order; just don't expect a response to your emails.  I placed an order and realized I ordered less of a part than what I needed.  I emailed immediately and got no response.  My order has shipped and I still haven't received a response.  I ended having to pay shipping twice, which is not cheap.  If I didn't need the exact same part I would have ordered elsewhere.  Disregarding standard business courtesy by not replying to emails at all or in a timely manner is a big pet peeve of mine.  I will be ordering elsewhere for my future orders.  UPDATE: I sent the email as requested.  Received one reply asking for more details and after I provided them, radio silence again.

Review.Titre: Disappointed in Live Chat…
Review.Contenu: I was disappointed your Live Chat feature was closed when within your posted hours. I tried Saturday at 5:53 pm Central time.

Review.Titre: Sluggish online ordering system!
Review.Contenu: I love purchasing from Mouser but your online ordering process sucks. Multiple minutes to complete searches, update my cart, and check out. Often sends me to Digikey!

Review.Titre: Telephone number requirement
Review.Contenu: Drop the assumption that everyone has a telephone, and therefore it's okay to REQUIRE the number to be entered to place and order.Telephones are not a prerequisite of living in the US.

Review.Titre: Very difficult to “drill down” to the…
Review.Contenu: Very difficult to “drill down” to the 27 ohm, 1/2 Watt resistor I was looking for. Filters not as helpful as I expected

Review.Titre: I tried you on line Chat and got no…
Review.Contenu: I tried you on line Chat and got no response for 10minutes and I also sent an email and got no response.

Review.Titre: Painfully slow site
Review.Contenu: I usually like how the site works, but it's painfully slow today, which cost me a lot of time.

Review.Titre: Parts from around the world.
Review.Contenu: Ordered from the UK website which had a UK contact number also. Turns out the 3 small items I ordered were in fact located and shipped from the US. Alarm bells should have rung when the shipping was £12 International courier.Had I know the air miles this would have clocked up I may have chosen not to purchase from this company.One item was faulty and after a week of waiting for a response I finally have a replacement being sent from the US......again. Fingers crossed this one is ok.

Review.Titre: I resell what I purchase
Review.Contenu: I resell what I purchase. Nevertheless, you have decided to charge me CA sales tax on some items. I have executed a CA resale certificate. That doesn't seem to matter. I realize Mouser has nexus in CA, nevertheless, I am reselling, not consuming, these items. Now I have to jump through accounting hoops to reclaim the funds from CA.

Review.Titre: This has to be the most confusing site…
Review.Contenu: This has to be the most confusing site I have ever tried to order from. It took me 4 o5 tries to figure out how to and I really don't know if the order is correct. I finally just hit the checkout button to see what I get.  Terrible ordering format !

Review.Titre: What is the real cause for order delays?
Review.Contenu: Until a few weeks ago I would have given Mouser 5 stars. After almost a year of covid barely slowing them down they have come to a screeching halt and are blaming it on covid. It seems the problems started after the February freeze that impacted most of Texas. Mouser's warehouse utilizes a lot of automation and I have to wonder if something happened to their system that forced them to fill orders manually.

Review.Titre: Shipping delays
Review.Contenu: I've used Mouser on numerous occasions without undue delay, but recently shipping and delivery times have become excessive.  Mouser put this down to Covid and trouble in Texas, maybe so but other companies do not seem to be having the same problems.  I'll stick with Digikey in the future who also ship from the USA but don't seem to suffer the same problems.

Review.Titre: Your online service us terrible. I can't cancel and order in progress
Review.Contenu: Your website deleted one of my ship to addresses and caused me to have to reenter the address and double order. On top of that I can't cancel the first order that had the bad address. There is no way to cancel and order in progress and there is no way to reach a real human to try to cancel it that way.

Review.Titre: online order failed
Review.Contenu: I placed an online order earlier so I would get the parts on Monday.  Now I find the order didn't enter and had to order now, costing me an extra day.  This all had to do with setting it up as a project.  That was confusing and somehow doubled the order.  When I fixed that, it must have dumped the order.  Disappointed. I should have called the order in.  Slower and not as efficient, but the inside sales crew is very helpful and accurate.

Review.Titre: Website Speed
Review.Contenu: For decades I have been relying on Mouser to provide most of the electronic components used in our business. While I still think you have the best pricing and customer service in the industry, over the past year your website has been slow to the point I've taken business elsewhere.  You are by far my preferred supplier but I do not have the time to wait up to 5 minutes for a page to load each time another filter is selected.I have no idea what happened, your site used to be just as fast as any other. I've checked on my end and found nothing. I figured it would correct itself sooner or later but that isn't happening, thus this review.

Review.Titre: Mouser was at one time the go to place, but not anymore!
Review.Contenu: They were at one time the go to place. Not anymore.Their services has really slipped over the last few years. I know as I have placed dozens of orders from them. Its become common now for them to be late on our orders - no matter if the items are in stock or of we order several weeks in advance of the date we tell them we need it by. We're trying to run a company, I'm not sure what Mouser is trying to do. I have started ordering from their competitor which starts with the letter D and the level of service is night and day.

Review.Titre: Quantities wrongly increased during checkout
Review.Contenu: I had a long order, during checkout, it increased the quantities by a multiple (1 to 2, 10 to 20, etc.), when I would correct the quantities, during the next checkout attempt, it increased by another multiple (1 to 3, 10 to 30, etc.). After a few days it seemed to straighten out so I could check out with correct quantities.

Review.Titre: Best Electronics Store but Worst Interface..Sad for Mouser and us
Review.Contenu: I like that you have a normal charge for shipping. I could not stand using your miserable interface a moment longer, so I needed to just get the inductor I needed, And the shipping was $8 for a $20 order (which is absurd). Then I noticed the hidden page that had $3 as the shipping. Whew! I would buy a lot of stuff from you if you could make the hobbyiest items so I could find and see and order them. Theyare all buried in the profesional stuff.Please offer a better interface.Paul (It's probably the worst store interface on the internet)

Review.Titre: Shipping cost
Review.Contenu: I'm a new customer. I made a deliberate effort to buy from you as a tribute to how long you have been serving the industry. I like your products and variety.However, I almost didn't buy from you at the end because of the shipping cost. In a world where everyone ships free this business model doesn't work any more.In my opinion you are losing a very large market segments of hobbyists and small startup companies to Amazon. Since I used your web site to search for the product I needed I didn't go ahead and buy it elsewhere, where I could get the shipping free of charge. But I'm not sure I'll return.

Review.Titre: The search ability of the web site…
Review.Contenu: The search ability of the web site seems to not be working correctly. After long waits one gets a blank white screen. It took hours to assemble this small order. I had to go back through old orders from 2015 to find where I had ordered the component previously then reorder it.

Review.Titre: 2 is too pessimistic...but I was…
Review.Contenu: 2 is too pessimistic...but I was annoyed that there was "nothing that could be done to speed up" resolution of a shipping weight issue based on an error in the web-site. No time line could be given...would it be a day? would it be a week? The option of speaking directly to the persons who investigate such things was not presented, so if they're confused...the problem will linger.

Review.Titre: I'm a bit frustrated that it happened twice now?
Review.Contenu: I'm a bit frustrated that two times in a row a particular fan #5912-255/2N is completely out of stock and none were on order? A 22 week lead time is UN-acceptable in my opinion. These fans in this size 25 x 25 x 8mm @ 5v, .4w with a tach wire should never be completely out of stock. Two should be the min that triggers an automatic re-order. They are just too inexpensive to be out all the time. 22 weeks to wait for an order to come in is ridiculous?

Review.Titre: Staff do not understand English
Review.Contenu: In spite of explaining CLEARLY in plain English to the Export Department clerk, that my order is a drop-shipment to a customer INSIDE the USA, he insisted that I am exporting the order, and refused to process it. He has a problem with understanding plain English, and negatively affects this customer's satisfaction with Mouser. Mouser subsequently cancelled my order, and I placed the identical order with Digikey, which Digikey shipped within 12 hours, with no problems.

Review.Titre: Not the cleanest order process
Review.Contenu: Was wondering what happened to my order.  Apparently id didn't get placed.  Most likely was due to the taxable/nontaxable checkbox.  Please streamline the order process.  Taxable/nontaxable can be set in the user profile with a default shown in the order that the customer can change per order.  Don't require a selection on each order.  Other companies (Amazon, McMaster etc) have simpler order processes.  Simplify yours!  Now have to pay premium shipping on my parts.

Review.Titre: It's really a hassle to have to fill…
Review.Contenu: It's really a hassle to have to fill out a tax exempt for each part number I order when the parts are all of the same type with different tips styles. It wouldn't take a Rocket Scientist to figure this out but it seems like Mouser doesn't have the right people to address this.

Review.Titre: it's been over a year since I was told…
Review.Contenu: it's been over a year since I was told the resale info would be in place. I still have to request a resale on items I buy that are similar. No other distributor is doing this and not sure why a company as large as Mouser doesn't have an IT dept that can figure this out.

Review.Titre: The website checkout process is…
Review.Contenu: The website checkout process is terrible. I change my shipping and delivery address in the account settings and it changed it back to the old address during checkout. Also, there was an option for economy shipping that simply disappeared as I went to submit the order.

Review.Titre: On line ordering is far too difficult…
Review.Contenu: On line ordering is far too difficult especially when trying to locate individual electrolytic capacitor values.Many other items are also very difficult to locate. Would be much simpler with the old paper catalog. Send me one if you have one!

Review.Titre: Unbelievable shipping charges
Review.Contenu: I guess you can't argue about the choice and stock, but unless you will qualify for free shipping (over £30?) then don't bother. The cheapest uk shipping option offered is FedEx International Priority at £12 at the time of writing

Review.Titre: DigiKey has a much better site for searching
Review.Contenu: DigiKey has a much better site for finding items.  Try searching for a certain size of potting box on the Mouser web site compared to DigiKey. We only use Mouser if DigiKey does not carry the item.Sorry to say this, but it is true.

Review.Titre: Very poor on line catalogue search.
Review.Contenu: Today I was looking for a 4 circuit mini phone plug. Part# /Keyword did not recognize mini phone plug, phone plug, or even plug to get me to a place where I could do a better search. I have had the same problem with looking for electrolytic capacitors. I sometimes just give up or have to call directly and talk with a tech. Seems like the search could be improved!  Also I call and think I have my acct straightened out when next time I log in to order it doesn't recognize my user name or password and so I have to put in all of my information again, a real time waster for me!

Review.Titre: Shipping costs more than parts
Review.Contenu: A USPS parcel post option would have saved half the cost of the order.Also, I had to enter my changed address four times.  A "shipping same as billing" would have been helpful.  So would a system that just did what I told, instead of trying to be helpful.

Review.Titre: From A1 service to pretty poor in a few weeks
Review.Contenu: I've used Mouser as a UK customer for the last 8 years to supply most parts for my Amplifier overhaul business and they had been superb. Great stocks of quality parts coupled with really rapid shipping via Fedex meant orders were here within a 2 to 3 days and often beat UK suppliers.  Not any longer,  long delays in shipping the order out of the warehouse and on top of that Fedex now have serious delays with my current order stuck in Memphis for the last 4 days. Fail to understand how you did so well through a difficult year when most weren't and then just fall to pieces in the last couple of months. Will switch to Digikey for the next major order and see how they do for a while before coming back to Mouser.

Review.Titre: Online processing took six days, Digikey out the door the same day.
Review.Contenu: We are spoiled, with Amazon and the like.  When one places an online order for a product in stock we expect it to be processed the same day.  In this case the order was placed and accepted Thursday and it wasn't until the following Tuesday that we were made aware that a mailing label was generated and we should expect the package a week later using USPS three day delivery.  The USPS did better and we got the package 8 days after we ordered it.  Definitely not instant gratification by a long shot.  We will try this again and see if this was a fluke or if this is the way Mouser Electronic values and processes online orders.

Review.Titre: I need to print an invoice but shipping info not included
Review.Contenu: Where the heck is the shipping info. I need to print an invoice since this is a company purchase and have very little concern for any cost other than what is charged to the card. The TOTAL price is what needs to be annotated by accounting

Review.Titre: I will be taking my business elsewhere…
Review.Contenu: I will be taking my business elsewhere for products that we use in production but are automatically taxed by mouser for.  This is a real pain to have to fill out a form and send it in to get reimbursed for taxes.

Review.Titre: Hard to get non-taxable accout setup
Review.Contenu: Have followed instructions on 3 separate occasions to submit California sales tax exemption to Mouser.  They still ask e-mail me asking to send one to them and tell me to do the same thing I have done already.

Review.Titre: Bad Mouser shipping experience.
Review.Contenu: I have used Mouser for well over 20 years, recently their shipping has started to get a little weird. The latest is I ordered 3 items last Thursday, 100 each, all in stock in the multiple thousand quantities. The order finally made shipping today, Tuesday. So much for there touted same day shipping. This happened the last time I ordered as well, I don't know what is happening but they are not getting things out the door in the promised fashion. They have been a good source of parts for me in the past, and I hope so in the future. But they need to get the shipping under control.This is my response to the reply from Mouser-I have been in touch with you regarding this order, needless to say I was underwhelmed by the response(s) I got. The result is this post.

Review.Titre: Be very careful what you purchase on…
Review.Contenu: Be very careful what you purchase on their website, they don't clearly mark what a unit equals for the item you are purchasing.  For instance you are buying a 6ft stick of conduit with a unit price of 6 dollars, one would assume that is 6 dollars per 6 ft stick, with a 54 stick minimum, with no mention anywhere of per foot, so in reality, after I receive the item, I find out the unit equals per foot not per stick. So your shipment comes in with 9 sticks of conduit, not 54.  Very deceiving.  After acknowledgment from sales support that website is not clear at all, no RMA is offered because it was a drop shipped item, not stocked.  Tough luck.  Rep said he would see what the manufacturer might do about it, when this has nothing to do with them.  Im not holding my breath...

Review.Titre: I sent a message about a previous…
Review.Contenu: I sent a message about a previous order..I received 2 different contradictory e-mails and it seams no one really read my request .. which is the reason I am re- ordering now.

Review.Titre: I am located in Texas and I have…
Review.Contenu: I am located in Texas and I have ordered from Mouser for about 20 years.  I have grown accustomed to ordering by 8 pm, having the order on a UPS truck that night, and having it show up by 10 the next morning via ground shipping.  My latest order has taken almost a week and it's not even ready for shipment yet.  What is going on?  Isn't the warehouse automated?  I work for a large research facility.  Over the years I have convinced co-workers to order through Mouser for last-minute things because stuff literally arrives the next morning.  My last orders have been very delayed, and I just discovered that the delay is on Mouser's end, not the shipper's or our purchasing dept.  I'm sorry, I can't order from y'all anymore until this gets sorted out.  We need updates on how this situation is progressing, and when packing times are expected to get back to normal.

Review.Titre: Pro  =  Pricing and Quantity   -    Cons listed below (long).....
Review.Contenu: Pro  =  Pricing and Quantity - we are a small shop, can't order 100 / 1000 min of parts.   We like Mouser due to reasonable prices and allowed to order lower quantities.CONS = Pic RARELY matches part - that is very difficult to find parts...Most of my Digikey orders are result of can't find part on Mouser due to out of date or simply wrong part pic.    Part information from Data sheet does not match listed values or is entered incorrectly.  Digikey has much better part data, and way more fields you can search / sift through to find parts by certain data spec sheet values.   Mouser people are just not careful of how they enter data sheet values.   Sometimes they don't even get the part into the correct BROAD category, so you search for 10 minutes, and then realize it was in a different category....

Review.Titre: Component Rationing! - Is the war still on??
Review.Contenu: Unfortunate that they have had to introduce a maximum order quantity for some lines, effectively limiting what you can buy, something that won't sit well with a lot of OEM's. I fully understand the need to limit stock at the current time, so that it isn't panic bought, or bought up and then offered for sale at a higher price on the grey market by brokers, however a manufacturer such as ourselves need to be able to order product in thousands just to be able to manufacture and keep their own staff employed. I'm not sure that cutting off the means to do that by limiting orders to 1000pcs of a line is the best way forward. When all of this mess with Chipageddon finally gets sorted out, customers will remember the businesses who helped them out and no longer show any loyalty to those who didn't. In the meantime, i'll leave Mouser to focus on what appears to have become the low volume, hobbyist market.

Review.Titre: Fix your website
Review.Contenu: You need to fix the site. it will only allow finding or adding additional parts if you first return to the home page. Adding from the cart view always displays an error screen.

Review.Titre: order error flashes up so fast you …
Review.Contenu: order error flashes up so fast you can't read it. and no further info provided, but since an order # is not achieved the order is submitted again to get it to go through

Review.Titre: Mouser rejected my card i had on file
Review.Contenu: Mouser rejected my card i had on file - I have used this card before just fine - I had to delete the card on file and add it back as new. What a pain!

Review.Titre: 7.99 for shipping of a single switch
Review.Contenu: 7.99 for shipping of a single switch? You need to have a more economical option for those less fortunate and more sane. Total of 25 for a toggle switch is disgusting.

Review.Titre: Another missed shipment
Review.Contenu: For most orders mouser has been great but this is the second time we placed a Next Day Air order before the deadline and the items didn't ship in the last 6 months.  There was no call or email letting us know the items wouldn't ship on time.   If Mouser is unable to fulfill shipments that are made before the 8pm deadline, maybe the deadline should be moved to an earlier time? When Mouser is unable to keep their deadlines, it puts us in a position where we are unable to keep promises to our clients which costs our reputation and hurts our bottom line.   We will be going back to Digikey for time sensitive orders as over the past 13 years they have only failed to make the deadline once.  They called us to let us know there was an issue shipping out the package and worked out a shipping solution that arrived the next day using courier service.

Review.Titre: I don't care for your new web ordering page
Review.Contenu: I've been ordering from Mouser for almost 15 years now and they are a great company with fast service but there new web ordering page is horrible. The navigation is awful. You are forced to  scroll endlessly. Also, after you order a part when you click on continue shopping, it kicks you out of the menu options you were in from the last part you ordered. You then have to start over.  This is very annoying, especially when you are ordering several parts in the same category. Your old website ordering was much better. All options were laid out from left to right. Now it takes me twice as much time to order the same items.  I order at least once a week from Mouser. You are my number one supplier but I've been using digikey and Newark more and more now because of your website. Please put it back the way it was. Please!!!!! Thanks for your time. Best regards, Steve Veilleux /SVT Audio LLC

Review.Titre: I've been a customer forever
Review.Contenu: I've been a customer forever.  I don't know how you guys plan to compete with no catalog and insane overpricing as compared to the Ali crowd.

Review.Titre: I appreciate the price for the item …
Review.Contenu: I appreciate the price for the item that I needed however, the shipping is very problematic.  I placed my order which I also paid for overnight shipping.  I called after the order was placed to confirm that it would get shipped out that day (since the items were in stock) so that I would receive the next.  I was told they ship out all the way until 8 pm and seeing as how it wasn't even noon it would go out.  I get a phone call today, the day that I am supposed to receive the items, stating that it didn't ship until today with no real explanation other than the warehouse may not have gotten to all the orders.  In my opinion if someone pays for overnight shipping and the product is available, then that order should be processed and sent out the day it was placed.  Yes, I was told I would receive a credit for the shipping but it doesn't change the fact that I don't have the items that I needed on the day I needed them.

Review.Titre: Big problem
Review.Contenu: Big problem.  I got 1/8 Watt resistors when I ordered 1/2 Watt.  I got 1/2 Watt resistors when I ordered 2 Watt.  Something is very wrong.

Review.Titre: You have no mechanism to all me to…
Review.Contenu: You have no mechanism to all me to modify or cancel and order, even if it's immediately after it was placed.

Review.Titre: not able to create/recover my account
Review.Contenu: I am not able to create/recover my account because I forgot my login information. Have to pay anonymously.

Review.Titre: What happened to the price break at 200pcs for 1K resistors?
Review.Contenu: All other resistor values that I checked have a price break at 200 pcs. except 1K. Whats up with that?

Review.Titre: When I need a part I can't buy 3000…

Review.Titre: Purchased 2 Nos
Review.Contenu: Purchased 2 Nos. LPCXpresso board for LPC1769 with CMSIS-DAP probe. We received one board perfectly fine and second one with broken jummper. We rasied our concern and they said to replace it and wanted to scarp the brokeb jumper board and we did so. For these two boards we paid around Rs 2400 as customs duty and we informed they we wont pay another customs duty for replacement. Support without any knowledge said ok ok for all our concerns raised. But finally when the replacement board came customs again charged around Rs. 2600 again for which we fought to DHL and Mouser. None responded and we indrectly forced to pay and release the package from Customs. Finally when we received the replaced we again found the jumper was broken. When raised the concern to mouser their support initally said the person who handled the issue was on leave etc. and finally spoke to a gentlemen. He said if i want replacement i need to capture a picture of two broken boards keept side by side as proof. Thing is one the first time itself we striggle and proved the board was damaged with photos and showed proof that the time we received the courier and time we raised the concern etc. My great anger and displeasure is for Rs. 1662 board they made to to pay Rs. 5000 as customs and still we have got one undamged board. Mouser rocks how to frustrate customer and get out trouble.

Review.Titre: MOUSER
Review.Contenu: LOT'S OF MERCHANDISE. FILTERS ON TRYING TO FIND SOMETHING--COULD BE BETTER.

I would appreciate a more rapid…
Review.Contenu: I would appreciate a more rapid response to PO and receiving issues.

Review.Titre: It used to be much easier to place an …
Review.Contenu: It used to be much easier to place an order. I'm too mad to explain.

Review.Titre: Last order shorted 18% of resistors
Review.Contenu: Good quality but they can not count. Check order when it arrives.

Review.Titre: Terribly clunky search interface
Review.Contenu: It took me 6 hours of using the search function on the Mouser website to order 23 items which I had a clear bill of materials for.  I've never been so frustrated with an online shopping cart system before this experience.   The entire website loads its pages as if it I were on a dial up connection in the late 90s.  To ensure it wasn't my 4 year old MBP running slow, I opened another tab to see if Google was loading slowly, and sure enough it was just the Mouser site.  I use this laptop everyday for audio recording/video editing and it does those jobs quite well with no noticeable slowdown of performance. After about an hour of trying to use the search function and narrowing the scope of my search, I realized that despite directly typing mouser.com into my browser, I hadn't even been on the full site.  I wan't on the mobile site either (at least I'm hoping it wasn't the mobile site, because that would be a terrible way to navigate the site on an iPhone or iPad).  After clicking the view full site button, my experience was marginally better until I kept getting messages trying to confirm I wasn't a robot, because apparently I was clicking through the website too fast. Had Mouser not had all the parts I needed, which I was unable to get elsewhere, I'd have made my purchase somewhere else.   I'm not the type of person who enjoys writing bad reviews...in fact, I regularly become a raving fan of any company that exceeds my expectations.  I'd love to see my experience somehow salvaged.  The ball is in your court to redeem my shopping experience. Thanks,Derek Studt

Review.Titre: Available parts and pricing are…
Review.Contenu: Available parts and pricing are awesome.  Search engine needs drastic improvement. UPS shipping seems very high.  USPS mailing for just a few parts would be extremely more cost effective.

Review.Titre: "PLEASE CORRECT ANY ERRORS DISPLAYED" but no errors are displayed
Review.Contenu: I did not want to pay with PayPal but I had no choice because the system wasn't working right.  When I tried to pay with our credit card, which we use with Mouser regularly, the screen said "PLEASE CORRECT ANY ERRORS DISPLAYED" but there were no errors displayed.  This problem happens about 1 out of 4 times when I am trying to check out.

Review.Titre: Mouser# 863-LM2931AT-5.0G max voltage misleading
Review.Contenu: On Mouser# 863-LM2931AT-5.0G Voltage Regulators, the specification table says "Input Voltage, Max: 40 V" , however the datasheet PDF says "Over-Voltage Shutdown Threshold 26 to 40 V.It is mis-leading and disingenuous for the specification table to list 40 volts max when that just means that it will not be damaged by that voltage, but it will have shut down and will not operate at that voltage.

Review.Titre: Couldn't proceed on my phone
Review.Contenu: Couldn't proceed on my phone (power was out). Said to correct an error when I got the the credit card, but didn't indicate what that could be. Filled out the identical info on my PC (when the power returned) and it went through. Missed the shipping deadline because of this.

Review.Titre: Only 1 or 2 Cincon TRE25120 AC wall…
Review.Contenu: Only 1 or 2 Cincon TRE25120 AC wall mount adapters available with 2.1mm barrel specs and then you don't reorder them for months.

Review.Contenu: Product pages for 576-298907-030/576-298907-040 are slightly confusing. Picture shows both fuse holder and cover, when part numbers are only for one of the components. However, customer service did rectify the situation by accepting a refund.

Review.Titre: Paypal gateway wording issues
Review.Contenu: When paying with paypal, the last screen on paypal the button to return to this site says "continue to review order" making it sound like the order has one last step before it is placed. That is not the case, it returns to the "order received" page with no warning or way to confirm placing the order.

Review.Titre: Problem with ECAD Model download..  Purchasing the item was fine.
Review.Contenu: Purchasing the item was fine.. But I could not manage the web site for the ECAD Model download.  The site recognized me and allowed me to sign in but that's as far as I was able to go.  I like the old - "just click" way better!!

Review.Titre: Mouser is great and used to have the…
Review.Contenu: Mouser is great and used to have the best electronic parts website there was. No longer - the site is slow and cranky, and doesn't automatically open to the sorting options like it used to.Go back to the old site!!!

Review.Titre: Poor customer service
Review.Contenu: Great website.  Provides me with the information I need.Customer Service could improve.  Lots of changes recently.  Wanted to talk with an outside sales person and I was asked why I wanted to talk to one.
