Review.Titre: Mouser has gotten so BAD
Review.Contenu: Mouser has gotten so BAD, with the SEARCH function misbehaving many times, it is almost driving me to Digikey! Plus, having no catalog anymore (NOT EVEN ONE TO DOWNLOAD) makes it hard to buy now days. Mr. Buffet, you should reconsider your investment !!!  In the last 3 years, Mouser has become one of the places I DO NOT buy from anymore, if I can help it.

Review.Titre: Referring your repeat clients to DigiKey, Seriously??
Review.Contenu: Mouser used to be most helpful.I called today looking for a difficult to find transistor, MJE16002.The technician told me that unfortunately Mouser does not distribute for MJE and referred me to Digikey..  Digikey had access to these transistors but only in a lot of 314. The tech then looked for a substitute and found BUL-49D but they were out of stock.  I searched go for that part and voila, they were on hand at Mouser. I’ve ordered them.Your techs need to take a little time to look for subs instead of being lazy and referring your clients to your competition.

Review.Titre: Mouser has by far the largest inventory…
Review.Contenu: Mouser has by far the largest inventory of electronic items imaginable.  BUT, their new website design is beyond slow - it is painfully slow.  (The previous version of the website was much faster all around.)  Recommend you place your order when you have absolutely nothing else to do in the next hour.

Review.Titre: Been weird lately
Review.Contenu: Up to this point you've done great.  My last two orders were disappointing: 1) One of the bags was labeled correctly but did not contain any parts; 2) a part was labeled as available but then back ordered; 3) a lot of parts seem to be unavailable; 4) my last order took over three weeks to arrive.  Most of the delay was ay your facility.I hope this is just a COVID hiccup and you return to your previous 5-star service.

Review.Titre: Once again there is no drop-down box to…
Review.Contenu: Once again there is no drop-down box to select whether sales tax is to be charged on the payment pages. There used to be one and Mouser has our tax resale number. I have been in touch with the sales IT dept at Mouser about this but it is still not fixed.......

Review.Titre: Hello Mouser,
Review.Contenu: Hello Mouser,Our Corporation's Tax Exemption is on file (on your system),  compere it to the e-mail provided and stop ask for it every time, Additionally, if base on the email provided your "app" will automatically fill the rest of the forms (Corp. name address etc.) it will be nice.Please be advised that due to security reasons we prefer not to set account password or to create account.Stay safe,Regards,Ron

Review.Titre: Free Shipping Please!
Review.Contenu: Quality & service are great. However, shipping is too slow and very expensive. Honestly, due to the shipping issues, I only buy from Mouser when I cannot find the parts I need on Amazon. I would prefer to buy from Mouser as I can always trust the quality of their components. I just wish they had free next day shipping like Amazon.

Review.Titre: S&H is Highway Robbery at its finest
Review.Contenu: Charging $39+ for an order shipment that would easily fit into a USPS Medium Flat Rate Box five times over is highway robbery.  The total weight of this order is less than one pound.  No way will it cost $39+ to ship this order to me - it will probably be on the order of $6-$8 total.  Throw in shipping supplies and maybe the total comes to $10-$12.  Charging $39+ really is highway robbery.

Review.Titre: Needs a confidence when choosing an item
Review.Contenu: Whenever I make a decision to buy, I always confuse and try to make sure if I'm buying a right pair. I have an experience that sometimes a staff at Mouser also confuses and sends a wrong one.If a product is a receptance or socket and there is a plug or pin for it, showing a proper product(s) that matches with the product would be very very helpful and it will make me easy to decide which two are a proper pair.

Review.Titre: I wanted to add one more part after …
Review.Contenu: I wanted to add one more part after placing my Web Order No:      13281814 . but your executive during chat I was forced to cancel my Web Order No:      13281814 and i have placed a new order with additional part. i think this could be avoided by just adding the additional part by chat executive. this is what we do with Digikey. i havent faced any issue with Digikey like Mouser

Review.Titre: shipping charge not shown on order
Review.Contenu: Hi-I'm not that dissatisfied.The order form that I received when I placed my order does not show the shipping charge.  The merchandise total=sales order total of $14.62, but shipping ($7.99 in this case) is not shown.  you guys should fix the form.Order #  12684494 If it looks different to you, then I can show you the pdf that I received.thanks,Gary

Review.Titre: Parametric search is annoying.
Review.Contenu: The ordering experience is very nice.  No complaints.Customer service is very good.  No friction there!The parametric search is really annoying.  I miss the ability to enter a range of values like DigiKey and the units comprehension in Octopart.If it weren't for these two things there's a good chance I'd order exclusively on Mouser.

Review.Titre: good but could be more accurate
Review.Contenu: Every Order I place for capacitors has been in error.  There are at least 5 to 7 items missing from every order or the wrong value.  the error is monetarily small so not worth the time to complain.  But it is frustrating when I am installing parts in my projects.  Orders should be checked by different people for accuracy.Your customers deserve to get the correct parts. ThanksMike

Review.Titre: Please update your the section of your website that deals with account information
Review.Contenu: Every time I went to checkout the phone number associated with my shipping address was not correct.  When you click 'update shipping address' there is no option for editing the phone number associated with that address.  Same with billing address.  If you update contact phone it auto populates the billing address phone when you checkout.  Not the case for shipping address.

Review.Titre: shipping service not as mentioned while selection
Review.Contenu: I selected 2nd day air on thursday so that i can have the part on saturday. Now it shows the part will be here only on monday. It seems the shipped should have selected 2nd day air saturday delivery and it was selected 2nd day air regular and hence it is delivered Monday. I am paying extra money and getting it delivered in the regular time of 4 or 5 days. Will my extra money be returned back? or will someone be able to interfere the shipment and have it delivered tomorrow.

Review.Titre: Just switched from Digikey
Review.Contenu: Digikey had a major SNAFU yesterday and I didn't get me parts I needed today, so I wanted to try Mouser. I found the BOM tool very cumbersome to use, I ended up having to import multiple times because I couldn't figure out how to delete a back ordered item.  Plus the additional step of having to select output fields was just an unnecessary step in my opinion.

Review.Titre: Poor processing time, delayed a day before shipping is processed.
Review.Contenu: It amazes me how I can order something over the weekend and pay for Priority mail and still takes 4 days to get to TN from TX, one time, it took about 7 days with said shipping. I have better luck with other sites when it comes to shipping. My biggest gripe about his company, considering I order roughly $50 a week form them.

Review.Titre: Order process went OK except for …
Review.Contenu: Order process went OK except for essential information (cost) "falls off the right edge of the screen, and I can't scroll to see it.  Stop writing apps for widescreen!  That is for watching movies in a theater, not doing business.Using old-fashioned paper catalog is easier.  That's how this order was determined.

Review.Titre: placing an order
Review.Contenu: there is no way that I could figure out, how to modify or cancel and order placed but the order was on a pending hold for a tax certificate.  It just sits there until I submit a tax certificate.   But I had decided not to submit the tax certificate and simply wanted to modify the order and pay the sales tax. Therefore, I just let that order stand in "pending mode"  and then went back to the cart and placed a new identical order, but with sales tax added.

Review.Titre: FIx your search engine already
Review.Contenu: FIx your search engine already! When searching for parts, you should be able to eliminate items that are not in stock instead of forcing people to filter though everything. This goes for other categories as well! This makes it difficult to get the best part for the best price, but maybe you guys like it that way :P

Review.Titre: Clumsy ordering multiple values of 1 part - carts duplicated
Review.Contenu: I like the saved cart and project features in general.  They help track separate projects.  I find, though, that ordering multiple resistor values in one sitting or capacitor values requires 3 or 4 filter resets instead of just changing the value and auto-filtering.Coming back to the cart is a problem - it's too easy to duplicate the parts quantities and have to re-edit the list.  There are warnings about this, so Mouser is aware.  It would be better if it was fixed instead.

Review.Titre: Great item availability, excessive shipping cost
Review.Contenu: Item I wanted, 2 electrolytic capacitors, were in stock with the required specs. No minimum purchase quantity required.  Great.  But the shipping charge was $7.99!  These capacitors only weigh less than an ounce each, and would fit in a very small box.  The shipping cost seems excessive.

Review.Titre: Incorrect order total on order invoice
Review.Contenu: While I was placing my order, I saw that it included shipping and tax in the total. After the order was placed, I tried to print an invoice for my records, but the printed order did not include either of these values, and so was no the correct total. I'm not sure what the hold-up is. You should know whether or not these items are in stock, what they cost, what the shipping will be and what the taxes will be - you showed me all of these when you asked for my payment after all.

Review.Titre: Printing an invoice?
Review.Contenu: I finalized my purchase, screen says my "order is now complete", but when I look at the print view it does not show the shipping charges or the final total... What gives?    If it is final, then the print view should show all the charges and I should be able to print an invoice!  ...not just part of an invoice.

Review.Titre: Faster "quick order" process
Review.Contenu: Please make it easier to just go to the quick order screen to order parts. Maybe on your main menu page, list a "quick order" icon (you used to have this). Not all of us need to set up a project, share our parts list with others, etc., etc.

Review.Titre: Great selection, some unexpected order/shipping delays
Review.Contenu: I just ordered my third order, I couldn't find my part anywhere else. The firs time, it came within a few days but for SOME REASON my last order took a MONTH to get here if not more. I'm really hoping the order I just placed gets here in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: I understand "ground shipping" but $8 …
Review.Contenu: I understand "ground shipping" but $8 is too much. Thar rate adds almost a $1 to each of my parts that I ordered that cost about a $1 each. doubled my cost. I thought you had a GROUND rate of $3.99.That would help in this case. High shipping is on reason I chose other providers.

Review.Titre: my error…
Review.Contenu: 2 items I ordered never showed up at check out? 1uf and .33uf mkp capacitors. your website really needs to be redone it is hard to use!!!P HollandMy error..items were shipped.Sorry. Mouser is the best source around for electronics supplies.PHHolland

Review.Titre: I just printed my order
Review.Contenu: I just printed my order - I'm being charged for tax and shipping which does not show up on the downloadable or printable order.  Why not???? This is useless unless it shows the entire cost! Please fix this or at least provide the option to print the entire invoice.

Review.Titre: Higher price, higher shipping cost
Review.Contenu: Price cheaper at at least 3 other vendors... and I am especially upset with the high shipping costs... for these 2 items, Mouser could have shipped insured and tracked USPS for $4.50, but charged me Priority rates ($8)... keep going, and I will be a "past Customer"...

Review.Titre: Ordering OK but corrupt account data.
Review.Contenu: The ordering process is very nice and I received my initial confirmation email with everything correct but I just received a second email that has my office address as one that I haven't used in over 10 years!  Your various databases are not synced with each other.

Review.Titre: Shipping wayyyyy too much
Review.Contenu: Does Mouser usually have what I need? Usually. Sometimes.  These are the days of Amazon etc and mass shipping worldwide. Mouser, continually, for decades, charges 20~40% above the norm for shipping.  Especially for a few light items.

Review.Titre: Check out was stubborn
Review.Contenu: Check out was stubborn? No Ca resale # on file? Yes I have a CA Resale # with Mouser, why can we NOT use it?Also last order came damaged, it was package lousy the long chip holder came bent in ? I have never seen this happenAndrew

Review.Titre: Customer Review
Review.Contenu: Would like a way to find new part number from old part number & not have to find the part in the catalog. Great parts & great prices & prompt shipping, but then they always have for me. I will be a return customer without any doubt. Keep up the great work.

Review.Titre: Shipping..we need real numbers
Review.Contenu: We as the consumer needs to know what our shipping cost is before it ships.  If it is an estimate, it needs to be +/- 10% to be considered an estimate.  Then we can compare shippers.  This can be done and this is your business.  It must be possible.  Thank you.

Review.Titre: Pricing, menus and component filters
Review.Contenu: Good pricing and easy menus but component filtering & compare needs more work because the filters don't reset like they should and the compare function compares more than what's selected. Overall best experience for getting the right parts. Thanks

Review.Titre: orders on 8/20 and 8/21
Review.Contenu: I found you cart options and merging to be very bad and confusing.  I could merge carts but it would loose data sometimes, ie my customer reference and if I had chosen mouser reel I would have to confirm that you did not revert to cut tape on my final order.

Review.Titre: I have viewed the Mouser catalog pages …
Review.Contenu: I have viewed the Mouser catalog pages on my Android phone using Chrome, and it is not possible to see the bottom (maybe ten percent) of each page, which may have important information.  Something else covers up the page.  Please fix this.

Review.Titre: Can you add a way that recommended…
Review.Contenu: Can you add a way that recommended substitutes pop up with the item we entered? Also, A secret Question or two to get us both our username and PW would really help a lot for airheads like me. Thank You For taking my suggestions.

Review.Titre: Parts availability a real issue
Review.Contenu: You policy of letting stock on a part go to zero before reordering is causing me major upset. Folks like you were forecasting and ordering based on trends 30 years ago. Why can't you? Part: 450-4760Lead time: 17 weeks!!!

Review.Titre: Your search engine needs revision…
Review.Contenu: Your search engine needs revision badly!  Indeed, I nearly went with another vendor until I figured out a way around your search engine.  Finding the manufacturer part number off the other vendors site, I was able to find the desired parts on your system and, at a better price, hence my order.I tried searching for my parts using parameters value/rating/package configuration, etc., and was unable to find what I was looking for.  This, is the problem with you search engine.I prefer Mouser to other online vendors! However, it is a PIA to not find what I am searching for using your system, forcing me to research a specific part before attempting to find (and order) it in your system.

Review.Titre: You're website seems very slow.
Review.Contenu: You're website seems very slow.I was logged in at 0100 PDT, so maybe you're doing maintenance, but it was crazy slowGood shipping and service, but the website needs a speed bump

Review.Titre: Enjoy profiting off the shipping costs.
Review.Contenu: It was easy to find what I wanted (thanks to my source's helpful BOM), and you had everything in stock, but $8 shipping on a small handful of parts - effectively doubling the cost of the order - is just ridiculous.

Review.Titre: Mouser is not shipping items that can…
Review.Contenu: Mouser is not shipping items that can legitimately be shipped USPS ground. DigiKey will ship the item 860-4G USPS, and USPS says it is ok to ship it ground. I get poor service from UPS, and FedEx in my area.

Review.Titre: I would've given you 5 stars
Review.Contenu: I would've given you 5 stars, but when I went to print my order, it didn't show my TOTAL (merchandise + shipping).  It only showed my merchandise total.This would be understandable if the shipping hadn't been calculated yet because of weight, etc... However, on previous pages the shipping cost was already calculated and given for various shipment methods.This value could've been easily displayed on the web-order print summary.  I had to wait for the email to come showing the shipment amount again (so I could be reminded of what that value was).[Interesting... even in my verification email you didn't calculate an ORDER TOTAL for me to put in my checkbook register].-Jody

Review.Titre: Why are you wasting my time?
Review.Contenu: Why do you require me to fill out all of my personal info when PayPal provides that info to you automatically? You clearly place no value on my time and as a customer, that makes me never want to shop here again.

Review.Titre: Need better shipping variety
Review.Contenu: Not all orders need to be shipped priority.  Paying $8 shipping for a $4 item makes no sense.   To facilitate better checkout procedure and encourage more sales, USPS standard ground shipping should be available.

Review.Titre: We wanted to buy (15) of line item 1-…
Review.Contenu: We wanted to buy (15) of line item 1- but there is a min.max of (1) / month/customer.  Hard to qualify an R&D project with these  restrictions !

Review.Titre: Price was good but GND shipping prices …
Review.Contenu: Price was good but GND shipping prices a bit high. The weight is under 1 lbs; the price paid is over $1400.It would be great if free shipping were to be offered on purchase over $1000!Thank You.

Review.Contenu: You would get a better review from me if you didn't take months and months with orders, as you did recently.  However you sell good products, so I gave you 3 stars as average

Review.Titre: Mouser is overall a great provider to…
Review.Contenu: Mouser is overall a great provider to find connectors and terminals, but navigating their site and being able to easily find products can use some work. Two of the main issues I find with the site is pictures of products are not accurate, up to date, or sometimes just missing. Having accurate pictures of the product can go a long way in helping customers to identify the correct part for ordering. The second main issue is that on connector product pages, there should be links to other items used with the connector, such as terminals and seals. This would make it much more simple for the customer to find the terminals and seals for the desired connector. I end up ordering a lot of parts from other companies because sometimes it is too difficult, or takes too long, to find all of the supplemental parts needed with a connector.

Review.Titre: I often have to spread my orders out…
Review.Contenu: I often have to spread my orders out amongst multiple suppliers because Mouser either does not have the common item listed, or the price is ridiculously high. For example, Today's order was for relays I was forced to purchase elsewhere because they are not even in your catalog.Additionally, the price was almost 25% higher here than there for one of the other products which I purchased.However, the item I DID purchase here, was well priced and I like the low MOQ.Something that would be VERY beneficial as a customer is if you had a HIGHLIGHTED button that presented ALL available alternative components for a given item... that I do not have to go hunting for. This is EXTREMELY important for End of Life items. Not only would it save me time trying to track down those alternatives, it would make it easy for customers to find that product and thereby increase your sales.

Review.Titre: First time order with Mouser
Review.Contenu: First time order with Mouser. Web page works well and I was able to identify the exact components I needed to order. These specific super capacitors are not available from eBay, Amazon  or All Electronics. I was able to place my first order.However, all was not smooth. Your site kicked me off and said my computer was not connected with the Internet. Not so as I opened another page that showed I was still connected. I had to repeat my registration and finally got through. Thankfully, my order specifications were saved and after registration, I continued to place my order. Second, I tried to print my order after completion of the process using the "Print Order" link at the top of the invoice. It opened another window and printed out my order WITHOUT the complete totals that included the shipping and tax. I used a feature on my computer to get a complete invoice printout.I look forward to your emails and to shop for components on your site from time to time. Thanks.  John

Review.Titre: What happened to shipping same day?
Review.Contenu: Hi. Not trying to be super critical. But I've noticed the last several orders that I have placed... I place the order several hours before 7pm. Sometimes they ship out that day and sometimes they don't.  You are claiming same day shipping, but it only happens about 10% of the time. Last year my orders ALWAYS showed up the next day (San Antonio). Now, they always show up 2 days later. You guys are great and have lots of stuff in stock. But getting stuff the next day with ground shipping makes you guys my first goto for parts. Now that's not happening anymore. Your thoughts? Will the shipping thing get fixed anytime soon?  If this is a COVID thing, why don't you change your shipping claim accordingly?  The little time ticker at the top of your site says, "Order in next xx:xx hours to ship today".  If you changed it to "Until this COVID thing clears up, we are trying to ship same day, but most orders will at least go out next day", that would be much more clear!  Thanks!  Keep up the good work.  I am thankful you guys are in Texas!

Keep up the good work!    Mike Fortner

Review.Contenu: I think you are doing awesome but I had input info more than necesary. easy to find and order parts,print and download options function.

Review.Titre: Positive Experience
Review.Contenu: Purchased some components from this company. Easy to use website and delivery was on point.

Review.Titre: Surprised that many items are not allowed for Resale!
Review.Contenu: It's easy enough to find parts and complete orders. My gripe is that there are many items that Mouser finds taxable as they're being shipped to California. When we place an order and are told one line will have tax added (on an line we're reselling), I call Mouser and am told they can't do anything about it, BUT, when we're billed we can call their tax department to have it reversed. We shouldn't have to jump through this hoop!  It slows down ordering, makes problems for our accounting department. Mouser also probably loses sales over it. Granted, Mouser sells lots of items that that companies or individuals may purchase for personal use and say they're for resale, and I imagine Mouser may have been tested, or audited by CA to make sure they're collecting CA sales tax.I think CA is not the only state that collects sales tax from out of state sellers. How does/should a customer notify Mouser if part of a purchase is taxable? Mouser should add a tick box (or some such) to the shopping cart for items that customers could say they should pay tax on that line item. We have a Resale Cert, and it's on file with Mouser. Up until recently were never asked if all or part of an order was for resale. Mouser just assumed it was.

Review.Titre: Insane shipping cost
Review.Contenu: Shipping was WAY to expensive for 2 tiny items (less than 6mm in size) that cost 33 cents each. Ended up being over 8 dollars! Other than that, products are good.

You have stuff I can't get from digikey *or* they want to ship it from multiple sources.Where you could do better though is with your database parametric search times and add-to-cart selections. They take forever and ever. I am a recently retired I.T. manager and dev lead. I routinely optimized databases with millions and millions of records. It can be done. If we don't have a PO number on the packing slip, creates problems in receiving and accounting.  I never did find it on my order - put a note in the note field asking for the PO number to be put on the packing slip.

Review.Titre: I would like product sort to be able to…

Everything is quite smooth.I would like to be able to use Apple Pay, though. It's more secure and convenient, and besides that I get more cash back.

Review.Titre: The only thing I find VERY annoying is…
Review.Contenu: The only thing I find VERY annoying is your programming of the carts: when there is more than one it takes me a while to figure out how to change which is active. I think this is very dumb, or the product of lazy programmers!.YOU SHOULD BE ABLE TO MAKE A CART ACTIVE WITHIN SAID CART!. Maybe this is possible, but it is certainly not obvious.

Review.Titre: Always GREAT Service, BUT
Review.Contenu: Hello, Just one point to make regarding my last order. The App asks for a 'Billing Address' and a 'Shipping Address', which is just great. HOWEVER, the next box comes back with a "...you will receive an email...." and the email is the *BILLING ADDRESS*, not the shipping address. To me, upon shipment either both parties should be notified, OR, the person receiving the order should be notified.

I use ExpressPCB and the component library is DigiKey exclusive so many components have to be created. It would be great if ExpressPCB could be included in the CAD library support.

Review.Titre: Your Security certification on your…
Review.Contenu: Your Security certification on your order site has expired - and my browser would NOT allow me to create an Online account..... but the order went through it appears -  since I already have a Net 30 account with you...Thanks - David Hogg - NEMCO Controls, Inc.  10-29-2018David HoggNEMCO Controls, Inc.10-28-2018 . .    you already have my sales tax exemption on file...

Review.Titre: I love Mouser but....
Review.Contenu: First I want to say you guys are my favorite place to shop. The inventory is large, shipping cost is reasonable and fast. Parts prices are mostly reasonable also, but customer service is a big zero. I order pretty regularly and on one occasion had a problem with my order. I contacted customer service and they responded immediately to see what the problem was. I explained my issue with this particular order and waited for a response, which I never got. Oh well, hopefully next time there's a problem customer service will be more helpful. Cheers, Thomas

Review.Titre: Excessive shipping cost
Review.Contenu: Shipping cost is excessive!  First Class Mail for less than 16 oz should be a dollar or two.  I was charged $7.99 for service I neither want nor need.  No option is provided to request an alternative.  If you have a "policy" (a policy is required when there is actually no good reason for an action) then it should be stated.  Other than that, and a time-wasting backorder, things are fine.  Thanks.

Review.Titre: Internet ordering problem...
Review.Contenu: Tried to place an order via internet - refuses to accept the order displaying message 'Your order cannot be processed...tax exemption certificate', but the existing certificate Mouse has on file doesn't expire for two more years???  Why should I have to create a new certificate when there is a perfectly good one on file already?  Gave up on placing internet order.  Will directly with a live human tomorrow.

Review.Titre: Mouser review
Review.Contenu: I just placed an order for just over $2.00 it cost me just over $5.00 so ship it.That is the only problem I have, I know there isn't much you can do about that but it is frustrating to me. If ordered larger orders that would fall back in line. You stock most of what I need, shipping is prompt and parts well backed. I found your customer service very good when I needed it.Thank you for a job well done.James Cullins

Review.Titre: Small item searching
Review.Contenu: Expectedly, searching for a small (toggle switch legend face plate) was arduous.  The items are small and, if price is part of a vendors philosophy, they must be relatively inexpensive.  I found them at other vendor sites (one found it necessary to add a "$5.00 handling fee" to the total cost!) but the entire process at this site went smoothly and timely.  I would add something that you should consider  (along with several otrhers); if it is possible, add the USPS to shipping alternatives. Often, timing is not critical, and with small items or quantities, they are extremely price competitive.  Thank you. J.W. Wooten

Review.Titre: We find this company one of the best to…
Review.Contenu: We find this company one of the best to buy our electronics components at a very good price. However, it feels very bad to buy products from here many times and there is a loyalty program that might offer free shipping at least.

Review.Titre: the best of the few suppliers in…
Review.Contenu: the best of the few suppliers in electronics components out there, based on recent IC's and PIC's from Digikey that just did not work and the overpriced Oddwires supplier, mouser parts have not failed me yet. too bad other guys you're overpriced and have poor quality, perhaps you could look to Mouser to improve.....

Review.Titre: I shop here as Mouser makes small …
Review.Contenu: I shop here as Mouser makes small quantities available (unlike digikey). However, Digikey now allows search (prioritized by price) with an entered quantity (e.g. 100 or 1000 units). This is good as we are prototyping with one or three units but hope to sell finished deices in 100's or 1000's of units. Please keep up and implement search on price for "N" units. Good job and thanks..

Review.Titre: This was my first time buying from…
Review.Contenu: This was my first time buying from Mouser.  The search function was excellent in finding the desired items and the "buy" and checkout processes  were also straightforward and trouble free..  The "compare items" function was handy although several items I had unchecked prior to a subsequent compare still appeared in the comparison presentation... I suspect user error.  Mouser will now be my first go-to source for electronic parts.Larry Husemann

Review.Titre: Paypal or the like
Review.Contenu: This is 2017. You guys need to accept Paypal or the like. it a pain hunting for CC at the last minute plus start an account . if anything an account is a pain to open and a privacy risk.  I buy $35000 /month and typically will avoid suppliers that do not offer google pay or paypal. You guys happen to have the product but buying it is a pain. At least guest checkout! Otherwise love the online catalog.

Review.Titre: Watch the shopping cart totals.
Review.Contenu: I like everything with this company, till I used the save project feature in the shopping cart.  Some type of error, as it was doubling my order for everything.  I never hit the back button.  Manually retyped the quantities, and it did it again.  I just will not use that feature again.  Never had a problem before when not saving a project.

Review.Titre: Great site and interface, shipping could be cheaper...
Review.Contenu: Shipping is fast and there is a great assortment of products to fit almost everyone's needs, but I think shipping could be cheaper. I needed two capacitors to fix a power supply and the order total was less than $1, until they charge $7.99 to ship two capacitors. Keep in mind I am less than an hour away from their warehouse. This time I just went to Radio Shack and got the two pieces I needed...

Review.Titre: Great shipping and product
Review.Contenu: Great shipping and product. My purchase order # 23182384 was received in a timely fashion and no damage to package.but, of the 20 0431167281 clamp on ferrites, one of the internal media was missing, just the empty plastic snap shell.

Review.Titre: Seem to work easier this time when …
Review.Contenu: Seem to work easier this time when looking for a particular part. sometimes it can be a nightmare, as heading do not always seem right, but today was a better. The search works pretty good as long as you know that the particular item may be listed as multiple pinouts/headings, which are not always right.  Its getting better though.

Review.Titre: Photos of product-
Review.Contenu: I really wish you'd have the actual product photos posted, not just a representative photo. Sometimes this really is important to know exactly what a product is going to look like prior to ordering.  Automation Direct has started doing that, and it's really nice.  It may be time for an upgrade to your website. While  Damian

Review.Titre: Great selection, low prices, genuine components, but shipping is a bit pricy
Review.Contenu: It would be nice if you offered a cheaper economy shipping option, such as third-class mail. In many cases I'd rather wait a few extra days and save the expense of first-class shipping.Right now it's a toss-up between you and Arrow over which is cheaper.

Review.Titre: Shipping cost can be more dependent on …
Review.Contenu: Shipping cost can be more dependent on order cost or order size. $4.99 shipping for a $2.50 order containing 5 DIP chips is a bit much, but it's still $4.99 when placing an $80 order with a few hundred parts. It would be nice to see a more reasonable shipping cost assessment for really small orders.Thank you

Review.Titre: Unsecured ordering
Review.Contenu: When paying with a credit card, the page is not flipped to secure http which means your credit card information is transmitted in clear text (along with the CVV).  Happily they offer Paypal as well.  I'm happy they have the part I needed at a good price, but I would not pay with a credit card from this site.

Review.Titre: Want add to cart without forcing to choose what's next
Review.Contenu: I really don't like the option that comes up with every single cart-add to either continue shopping or go to the cart. It's an extra click with every item added. Let me set an option for the session or in my user preferences, but don't make me choose this with every item added!Thanks,ryan

Review.Titre: You've changed your search function…
Review.Contenu: You've changed your search function recently, and I do not like the changes. It seems to be much slower to respond. I also despise the "show more" button. I always want to see all the results. Don't hide most of them under "show more".

Review.Titre: Maybe if i'm ordering all through-hole…
Review.Contenu: Maybe if i'm ordering all through-hole components and for some reason one or two of them are surface mount, someone should/could verify if I meant to buy surface mount. Overall i love the website and find it easy to use and order. I will always come to mouser for part that I need.

Review.Titre: Mouser canada  grrrrr. But nice lady when i called fixed it
Review.Contenu: Bought from mouser canada and had to pay duty since it was brought in from usa. So a $100 part cost me 200+. Called to find out what was goin on and talked with nice lady that helped me correct this issue a bit.  However they need to add more in way of shipping as my part was loose and rattled around.

Review.Titre: I have been a Mouser customer for…
Review.Contenu: I have been a Mouser customer for decades, since the 1990s at the least. Every time I return to Mouser to buy parts, it refuses to recognize my login. I now have 4-6 of them at Mouser because of this issue. Please FIX this...

Review.Titre: Thank you your services as always. Please help us this time too
Review.Contenu: Hello, Thank you so much for your services as always. This time also we have to get them as our order #10481273 by 6/22 in Japan. I would like to ask you to change it shipping method to any earlier service at USP or DHL for Japan if you can. Please advice and help us.  Thanks in advance,Tetsuyuki Kamiya

Review.Titre: Like the new project access format
Review.Contenu: Like the new project access format. A nice touch would be the ability to see the Quick View information (the pop-up you have when in the Projects list) at the Submit Order page to be able to do a last minute triple-check on parts right before clicking Submit Order. Thanks!

Review.Titre: few short-commings
Review.Contenu: generally expensive on:-hook up wireno stock / poor stock levels:Electro mechanical - hardware - nuts and boltsOtherwise pretty good.DHL is best for international shipping - this option tends to be hidden.

Review.Titre: I usually order my parts from DigiKey…
Review.Contenu: I usually order my parts from DigiKey because of their exceptional parts search engine. Today I ordered this part from you because Digikey didn't have it. I'll check out your search engine for my next order.

Review.Titre: The only reason I did not give 5 starts…
Review.Contenu: The only reason I did not give 5 starts is because a multitude of different parts have the same picture depicting them.  Where it may seem redundant, physical pictures verify the part is correct, rather than assuming the duplicated picture is placed correctly.

Review.Titre: Mouser customer service is always…
Review.Contenu: Mouser customer service is always great. I would like to say that if you are going to ration parts it should be in even multiples. A lot of the parts that I use are used in pairs.

Review.Titre: I am having a great experience with …
Review.Contenu: I am having a great experience with your website. I would move it up to a 5 star if i could down load the invoice to an excel format so that i could easily enter into my system for pricing. at this time i have to manually enter all of the pricing. regards, Marc

Review.Titre: Navigation a bit tricky, but overall a satisfactory experience.
Review.Contenu: Navigation a bit tricky, but likely due to massive SKUs. Shipping a bit costly, a flat fee of $5 for 10 items or less would be better. Overall tho, pleased with site performance and product availability. Thank you very much.

Review.Titre: Had difficulty with generation of …
Review.Contenu: Had difficulty with generation of orders being separate, spent a lot of time trying to figure out how to combine.  Would like to see if I generate a project to have it pile up in one area prior to checkout as I had changes to make to it as I was building it.

Review.Titre: I love you all more than Digikey
Review.Contenu: I love you all more than Digikey. I wish your packers would place a small plug into small strips of IC's instead of gooey plastic tape. They sometime mutilate the plastic tubes. Otherwise, all good. A cookie would be nice.

Review.Titre: MUCH IMPROVED!!!!!! Thanks!
Review.Contenu: The search feature and your selection has greatly improved over the past 20 years, and was very noticeably improved in the last couple of years.  You have also managed to keep your prices competitive in the process.  Thank you and keep up the good work!

Review.Titre: Website is great and shipping is fast
Review.Contenu: Website is great and shipping is fast.  One thing - be easier to add customer part number / names in the beginning when I am actually ordering the part.  It is a pain to have to stop and go to the cart and put in my part number each time. More work.

Review.Titre: Love the new "schedule" feature
Review.Contenu: Love the new "schedule" feature.  However, the schedule does not show up on the printed document. Other than that, scheduling releases was simple.  Great job.  Thanks go to Rebecca Daily for letting me know about that added feature.

Review.Titre: Difficulty in matching mating parts
Review.Contenu: I had to contact sales and get a tech assistance to verify a relay and the plug-in base I selected would match. They did not, but the tech was able to give me the correct one. There should be a correct one suggested along with the part I want.

Review.Titre: Mouser has been a consistent supplier…
Review.Contenu: Mouser has been a consistent supplier of electronic parts.Delivery is on time, fresh date codes, reliable products and pricing is competitive. The only negative is that many times parts are 'backordered'.

Review.Titre: I think that Mouser does a great job
Review.Contenu: I think that Mouser does a great job. The only thing that I would say needs some help is getting back to the customers quicker. I find that sometimes it takes a long time for customer service to get back to you if there is an issue.

Review.Titre: Shipping Mix Up
Review.Contenu: The shipping label on my last shipment didn't include my name so Fedex Office opened the package to look for my name on the invoice, and even though I got the package, I wasn't very happy that they had opened it.

Review.Titre: Good source of parts but I'd prefer a…
Review.Contenu: Good source of parts but I'd prefer a larger selection. I do appreciate the ability to order small quantities. Website navigation is poor, takes too long to sort/filter for parts. Take a lesson from Digi-Key.

Review.Titre: Easy Website but please add PayPal
Review.Contenu: Easy website, thousands of products.  Would like to see PayPal as a payment option.  I run an ebay store and a website that takes payments by PayPal so being able to pay from my PayPal account makes accounting a lot easier.

Review.Titre: Mouser packaging is superior to DigiKey
Review.Contenu: I like the fact that the Mouser puts a barcode with the manufacturer part number on each bag. This speeds up the handling once we receive them. DigiKey only places some barcode internal to them, so we have to type part numbers manually. For that reason, I only order from DigiKey if Mouser doesn't have the part.I would love if you introduced something like a wish list of parts associated with my account. I often research parts and want to have the list of the promising ones on hand. And when I'm reviewing the cart, I'd like o be able to move parts ( for example the backordered ones) to the wish list.Another point of improvement would be the speed of searches.

Review.Titre: Mouser has been my "go to" source for …
Review.Contenu: Mouser has been my "go to" source for projects as their selection of in stock items continues to bring me back time and again. the service is excellent and "order" to "door" is always quick!

Review.Titre: DigiKey still has a better search…
Review.Contenu: DigiKey still has a better search engine, buy you typically have better prices.  But believe it or not, I am finding some deals on electronic components on Amazon with free shipping and 1 or 2 day delivery.

Review.Titre: Very good; suggestion for web page action when choosing components
Review.Contenu: Good, but easier "reset" of all params while remaining in "resistors" or "capacitors".  Simple "reset all", without exiting from the major area such as caps or resistors. Thank you.

Review.Titre: The Navigation...
Review.Contenu: The Navigation...It's hard for me to find things sometimes.I'm old school and I miss being able to view your inventory as If I'm looking through the catalog. I couldn't find that option anymore.

Review.Titre: Improved website.
Review.Contenu: Last time I was on your website....some years ago..., I was very disappointed with the experience. Now that you have improved the search parameters, I expect to do more business with you.

Review.Titre: a good review
Review.Contenu: Ive been dealing with you,both professionally and as a Ham Radio Operator, for too many years to remember I have ALWAYS been satisfied with your service.

Review.Titre: Enhancement Request
Review.Contenu: Good work on the web site.I would, however, like to be able to search by my part number.  Is there a way you could include matches against customer part numbers in the search result set?Thanks,    - Chuck

Review.Titre: When we make choices in the filters
Review.Contenu: When we make choices in the filters, we choose and then have to scroll down through hundreds of more choices to get to the next one.  Can a collapse button be added so it doesn't take so long?  thank you.

Review.Titre: My main wish is that when I select…
Review.Contenu: My main wish is that when I select "ship complete" for an order with backordered items, that I would be able to edit and add to or change my order while it is being held waiting for shipment.

Review.Titre: It astounds me still that I can get…
Review.Contenu: It astounds me still that I can get small orders shipped efficienntly for reasonable prices.  The order today was to repair a classic amateur radio transceiver (a TenTec Argossy II) and to build a backup power supply for my AT&T high speed internet/VOIP modem. The ability to order small quantity prototype quantities for hobbiest and repair markets is a huge service that I really appreciate.   The only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is the search engine continues to be a problem.  DigiKey has a better search engine, but you know that. My son went into electrical engineering, perhaps in part due to the magic of being able to order smal parts to use to repair cosumer electronics, that I have done from time to time.  Best regards,SteveKD4TTC

Review.Titre: I like your search engine for parts .
Review.Contenu: I like your search engine for parts .. it narrows down the list of bewildering size to the items that I can then choose from. Much better than others sites I tried. Thanks

Review.Titre: I have liked Mouser for many years
Review.Contenu: I have liked Mouser for many years. The only thing I do NOT like is how much the toroids cost me. But that does not have any bearing on my high opinion of Mouser.

Review.Titre: I've ordered several times
Review.Contenu: I've ordered several times, maybe 6-8 times in a year.  I buy stuff for our corporate lab and my hobbies at home.  Shipping is always fast, items are in stock, shipping charges are genuine, items are name brand and not cheap, fake knock-offs.      Mouser saves me a lot of stress.

Review.Titre: I like your fast shipping
Review.Contenu: I like your fast shipping! As a novice repairing my vintage stereo equipment it would be great to have access to easily searchable charts for equivalent outdated or NLA components.

Review.Titre: Great source for electronic components
Review.Contenu: Great source for electronic components. Simple to order and reasonable free shipping threshold. Buyer for 10+ years.

Review.Titre: Easy site to use
Review.Contenu: Easy site to use, helpful notes about related items shown.  Would like to see at link to graphic catalog type page to quickly see other items in the same family..

Review.Titre: I came and was able to locate my Caps easy
Review.Contenu: I came and was able to locate my capacitor type very quickly and , checkout was a breeze...I was happy to see 2 day shipping options, the whole reason I started my quest on Amazon was to get them quick, they couldn't do better than a week for no name caps, with Mouser I got Vishay caps and 2-day quick. Thanks Mouser.

Review.Titre: Mouser Order NOV 13 2023
Review.Contenu: The order I placed today is one of if not the most voluminous ones I've ever placed with Mouser.  There were no issues with the website timing out, which was extremely helpful during cross checking of my merchandise needs to entries placed.

Review.Titre: Your level of timely service matters to…
Review.Contenu: Your level of timely service matters to us and our awaiting customers. We have seen improvements that make you the first-stop for parts sourcing over the previous leading vendor, congratulations and we Thank You and your Teams for the great work!! "the Circuit Board Repair Team"

Review.Titre: I liked when things are in stock
Review.Contenu: I liked when things are in stock. I dislike when there is a huge minimum quantity, that makes it impossible to experiment, unless you are a fortune 500 company.But, you ALSO have a responsibility to stay in businessfor all stake holders involved.

Review.Titre: As a private consumer
Review.Contenu: As a private consumer, I've made numerous purchases from Mouser over the years. Since May 2022, 17 in fact. Most of the time, it has been Aptiv connectors and terminals which I needed for rebuilding wire harnesses for my Chevrolet truck. Mouser has never got an order wrong. Shipping has always been same day (unless I ordered on a Friday which understandably is not picked and shipped til Monday or Tuesday, I forget which). I've literally watched (through their website) an order be picked and prepared for shipment. Quite impressive how efficient they are. I also thought one of my orders was misdelivered because UPS said it was delivered yet it was not at my doorstep. I called them up and they were going to ship me out another one on them. Turns out, UPS guy marked it as delivered to avoid cut off time. He showed up to my home about an hour or so later with the package. I immediately called Mouser and told them what happened, and to cancel the replacement order. They did without difficulty. Man, this company is excellent. I just love ordering from them.

Review.Titre: I love Mouser
Review.Contenu: I love Mouser.  I am a DIYer and Mouser appreciates my orders.No one does as good a job as MOUSER!

Review.Titre: Simple as Pie
Review.Contenu: Everything I needed was in stock and I was pleasantly surprised to be able to have my order within two days.  I needed it soon, so that pleased me.  The site was a little tricky using it for the first time to look up and order 5 different items, but I figured it out. Creating the account was simple. The checkout was simple and quick.  I'm glad I found you.

Review.Titre: Company That Stands by Their Product
Review.Contenu: There was a delay in processing my first ever order, which is understandable. They shipped it out next day air free because of the delay. That's good service. Definitely using them in the future.

Review.Titre: Ordered on Wednesday, arrived today
Review.Contenu: Ordered on Wednesday, arrived from Texas today,  no customs delays. Well done Mouser and well done Fedex.

Review.Titre: First order to date
Review.Contenu: First order to date. Website works very well. Good prices on most items. Easy to download data sheets.

Review.Titre: Fast despatch, great prices
Review.Contenu: I've been amazed at the stock held. You work through a list of componets for your circuit and everything is in stock and at a good price.  And when you're prototyping, you can order one or two units. Fast delivery to UK too, with the order generally arriving within two days of despatch.

Review.Titre: Best parts search engine + details
Review.Contenu: Best parts search engine, Quick access to data sheet, 95%+ best pricing, fast shipping (with the little clock that shows how long I have if I want it shipped that day.) easy ability to report errors ("See an Error?") great back-order options

Review.Titre: Very fast delivery
Review.Contenu: Very fast delivery! Postage is a bit high at £12, so you have to spend a minimum of £33 to get free delivery, but the products come within a week from Texas! Very nicely packaged and will definitely order again.

Review.Titre: All components were in stock & of Great Quality
Review.Contenu: All components were in stock. Love the fast shipping and accuracy of the orders. Mouser is the best !!

Review.Titre: Mouser support has been great
Review.Contenu: Mouser support has been great.  Every time I make contact, whether for sales or when searching for a parts equivalent.

Review.Titre: Mouser is still doing a wonderful job…
Review.Contenu: Mouser is still doing a wonderful job in all areas of distributing electronic parts. All part info available to assist with part selection, good stock of parts, terrific website and user interface, and someone always answers the phone and whatever needs to be handled that person handles it right then without passing me off to someone else. Everything about how a company operates comes from the person at the very top. Thanks

Review.Titre: Parts were easy to find on website with…
Review.Contenu: Parts were easy to find on website with quantity pricing given with product descriptions. Checkout was easy with PayPal and no need to set up on account for a small purchase. Pricing and ease of process was competitive with Amazon ... something that is not always easy to do. Thanks and I look forward to getting my parts quickly!

Review.Titre: I've been buying from Mouser for years
Review.Contenu: I've been buying from Mouser for years. They ship SUPER fast and usually have what I'm looking for. I'm fairly close to them so my orders typically get to me the next day!

Review.Titre: Mouser rocks!
Review.Contenu: Component selection, availability and pricing is excellent, and shipping costs are very reasonable.  Search tools and filters work really well to narrow down choices, and having datasheets on everything available right there is so helpful.  Ability to order single components is key for hobby guys and prototyping.  And I don't recall ever having any errors on an order.  Keep up the good work, you guys are doing everything right.

Review.Titre: Awesome customer service!
Review.Contenu: Great website for finding any part I need. Also, on the few occasions that I've had needed to call customer support (including today), the phone gets answered by a human straight away who doesn't have to transfer me 5 times to get things solved...no need to wade through dozens of frustrating menus to only end up with some automated recording that your call is very important to you etc.

Review.Titre: The three people that I spoke to from…
Review.Contenu: The three people that I spoke to from start to finish that helped me get the right product I needed, ordered, shipped and delivered to my home were great. They were all very gracious, patient and showed such concern while helping me. I would tell anyone that Mouser Electronics is the best !

Review.Titre: Best on-line and easy search and ordering.
Review.Contenu: MOUSER has always had a great on-line ordering website.  Have been loyal customer for years and have only seen improvement.  Hardly ever consider those other electronic-products/components firms since MOUSER is so easy to use and very reasonable shipment.

Review.Titre: If they don't have it, it may not exist
Review.Contenu: Considering that Mouser likely has millions of items most of them very small like resistors, they have a fantastic online system and in most cases are willing to sell smaller quantities. For small shops like mine, this is a fantastic thing. It would be cost prohibitive if these folks took the COSTCO approach to retail and I'd have to give it up.

Review.Titre: First order was prompt
Review.Contenu: First order was prompt, the packaging was first rate.The site navigation went well, certainly better thanDigi-Key.

Review.Titre: Telescope Encoders AMT103
Review.Contenu: Although I only bought a small consignments they were delivered fast and with free postage. Will use again, only found them while researching encoders for my telescope, bought them for a fraction of what and astronomy shop sell them for!

Review.Titre: Great inventory, prices, and support
Review.Contenu: Always better inventory and better prices than other distributors.  Unbelievably fantastic support.  Your staff picks up the phone within three rings and there is no maze of buttons to press in order to speak to an actual person.  Pretty amazing.  I had a quick question today and Jessica was extremely helpful.  I don't know how you do it, but keep doing what you're doing.

Review.Titre: Great source for electronic components - Mouser
Review.Contenu: It took some time to learn how to use the product filters and use the Project tools but was able to find 95% of the components I needed to work on my small amateur radio project.  I may have spent less money using another company but I like the quality of the products offered.  Thanks!

Review.Titre: Superior shopping experience and inventory at hand
Review.Contenu: I love to see that you have inventory available at hand. Awesome job. This makes me want to buy more from you, so you can keep up this investment.Your website is easy to navigate. Manufacturer product codes are correct and it is easy to locate items. It was great to see that you are connected to modern payment terms. I love the report error link.

Review.Titre: Good job!
Review.Contenu: I like the ease with which parts can be shipped to our manufacturers in Taiwan and the no-added-cost shipments. Also, it is helpful seeing estimated restocking dates and quantities for parts that are either low in stock or out of stock. In addition, Mouser frequently has parts in stock that are not available elsewhere - keeping the pipeline flowing.

Review.Titre: Mouser makes it very easy to place…
Review.Contenu: Mouser makes it very easy to place orders online.  However, there is one request that I would like to make.  It would be extremely helpful if the online purchasing experience could be upgraded by adding the ability to provide tax status of orders by line item.  Most of my orders are for engineering and are taxable, but a few are for resale (no tax).

Review.Titre: Easy Site to Navigate and Search for Products That Were Not Available on Other Sites
Review.Contenu: Easy process to register, create BOM list and place order.  The Mouser site seems to have more available products and quantities than other sites.  When I searched other sites for the availability of products, the newer released products were not available yet or older products were discontinued or limited in quantities or out of stock.

Review.Titre: Great Experience!
Review.Contenu: I typically find what I am looking for in parts.  Service is always terrific.  I generally will get the parts within a day or two.  It is like having my own stockroom within my grasp, which is great for a small consulting business.

Review.Titre: the only negative is the website pop-up…
Review.Contenu: the only negative is the website pop-up for continue shopping and view cart.  that is unnecessary and slows down the ordering procedure.  when one hits the "buy" button the cursor should return to the part number entry position, the way it was a long time ago.  that would GREATLY improve the buying experience on the site and save a lot of time.

Review.Titre: All the items you carry !

Review.Titre: I rely on Mouser
Review.Contenu: Mouser is my primary source for parts in older, vintage, and antique electronics.  I know there are other, niche market suppliers but I rely on Mouser to get the most for my investments as well as my customer's.  I'm very happy with the selection of available, through-hole and axial lead parts.  Point-to-Point wiring is an artform and thus isn't suited for SMD where long leads and basic aesthetics are important to me and my customers.  Many desire as-close-to-original as can be obtained with modern components without restuffing capacitor cans and Bumble Bee casings.  Mouser is my go-to source for vintage components and I hope they continue supporting the vintage and antiques market.

Review.Titre: I'm having a problem with my previous…
Review.Contenu: I'm having a problem with my previous order. I sent a reply to that order confirmation with the problem and have yet to hear back. One part of that order [16v 100uF] had a high ESR and intended to order all parts as low ESR. I noticed on the shipping invoice that two parts of the order were low "impedance" [ESR] and the one was "general purpose" electrolytic capacitors. This is likely due to confusion in the order sheet parts selection platform. [I thought I was selecting low ESR parts on ALL the parts.]I found the parts today in their lists from a different manufacturer [Panasonic, I previously ordered Rubycon] in confirmed low ESR. I was hoping that to solve the problem they would at least forgo the shipping cost on this new order to get the right parts. $7.99 shipping for a small blister pack of components across a couple of states seems quite exorbitant. To have to pay that cost again to get the right parts is extremely disappointing.

Review.Titre: The best place to buy electronic components.
Review.Contenu: The best place to buy electronic components.Mouser is a place where I buy without fear. It offers DDP incoterms to buy with peace of mind from Europe, trusting that the Treasury and customs will receive what corresponds to them, without hassles or conflicts.Huge catalog, including the latest products the same day they hit the market, and always genuine products. Sometimes you can even buy engineering samples from Mouser.Makers and entrepreneurs love Crowdsupply (of course), and Mouser stocks many of their products, becoming the safest way to buy them.Delivery to Spain usually takes two or three days, via Fedex. Never ever had any problem on customs, thanks to Mouser's honesty respecting the DDP incoterms.Of course, after several dozens orders, there have been a few minor issues with some product, and Mouser have always resolved them quickly and professionally, after relaxed communication with competent and polite humans whose office is physically located in Spain (so far from the sad experience with their Thief River neighbors...).###El mejor sitio para comprar componentes electrónicos.Un lugar donde puedo comprar tranquilo. Ofrece incoterms DDP para comprar con tranquilidad desde Europa, sabiendo que Hacienda y aduanas recibirán lo que les corresponde, sin líos ni conflictos.Muchísimos productos, siempre originales. Entrega habitualmente en dos o tres días, vía Fedex.En un par de ocasiones surgieron problemillas con un producto, y siempre las han resuelto con rapidez y educación (al contrario que la experiencia con sus vecinos de Thief River).
